app.home_title: üß≠ Strategic Debt Compass (SDC) ‚Äî Expert Validation Prototype (V0)
app.home_caption: Expert validation prototype ‚Äî logic derived strictly from Ndiaye, A. and Kessler, M.: ‚ÄúA Strategic Compass for Navigating Senegal's Debt Crisis‚Äù, Finance for Development Lab, Policy Note 31 (Jan 2026). No new modeling.
app.home_purpose_p1:
The Strategic Debt Compass is a decision-oriented interface derived strictly from the report:

**Ndiaye, A. & Kessler, M. (2026)**,
‚ÄúUne boussole strat√©gique pour traverser la crise de la dette du S√©n√©gal‚Äù,
Finance for Development Lab, Policy Note No. 31 (January 2026).

[Access the full report (PDF)](http://findevlab.org/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/FDL_Note-31_Une-boussole-strategique-pour-naviguer-dans-la-crise-de-la-dette-du-Senegal_Janv26.pdf)
app.home_purpose_p2: Interface prototype (V0) developed by El Hadji Moudo Macina (2026).
app.home_purpose_p3: It translates the report‚Äôs analysis into an interactive decision space.
app.home_purpose_p4: This V0 is designed for expert validation, not forecasting.
app.home_does_1: Encodes the two strategic paths discussed in the report
app.home_does_2: Makes explicit the key policy levers
app.home_does_3: Highlights structural constraints (WAEMU/UEMOA, refinancing pressure, feasibility limits)
app.home_does_4: Maps combinations into a fiscal/social stress decision space
app.home_does_5: Provides traceable explanations (‚ÄúWhy?‚Äù) grounded in report logic
app.home_doesnot_title: What this Compass does NOT do (V0)
app.home_doesnot_1: It does not estimate new debt trajectories
app.home_doesnot_2: It does not simulate macroeconomic dynamics
app.home_doesnot_3: It does not introduce assumptions beyond the report
app.home_doesnot_4: All outputs are rule-based interpretations of the report‚Äôs logic.
app.home_validation_intro: This version is intended to test:
app.home_validation_1: Are the strategic paths correctly represented?
app.home_validation_3: Are constraint flags faithful to the report?
app.home_nav_intro: Use the left sidebar to access:
app.home_footer: This is a governance communication tool ‚Äî not a predictive model.
app.home_cta: Use the left navigation to explore the Compass.
app.compass_caption: Decision console (V0). Rule-based logic derived from the report. No new modeling.
app.trace_caption: Why the Compass logic is defensible (V0: section-level references).

compare.disclaimer: Comparison highlights trade-offs implied by the report‚Äôs logic (V0 rule-based; not a forecast).
compare.prompt_true: What would need to be true for this to work?

ui.placeholders_note: In V0, these are structured prompts for experts to validate; refine after review.
ui.compass_caption_v0: V0: rule-based positioning (no model). Hover points to see state and parameters.
ui.no_major_flags: No major constraints triggered in the V0 rule-set.
ui.what_to_change: What would change the result (V0 guidance)?
ui.compare_need_two_presets: Need at least two presets in data/presets.json to use Compare.

baseline.label: Baseline (starting point)
baseline.assumption: Starting point extracted from report assumptions (V0).

path.A_REPAY: Path A: avoid restructuring (repay at all costs)
path.B_RESTRUCTURE: Path B: external restructuring under IMF support

tips.timing: Try an earlier timing (Immediate/Gradual) to reduce refinancing cliff risk.
tips.financing: Shift financing toward concessional-heavy to reduce stress and risk flags.
tips.fiscal: Reduce fiscal intensity (High/Moderate) to improve feasibility and lower social stress.
tips.social: Protect social priority to reduce social risk and legitimacy stress.
tips.perimeter: Avoid including CFA-denominated debt if contagion risk is a binding constraint.
tips.none: Current configuration is internally coherent in V0. Compare against the alternative path to see trade-offs.

trace.intro: This page is a **transparency layer**: it shows where each Compass rule comes from in the report.
trace.right_desc: The internal logic key used to link rules ‚Üî explanations (technical, for maintainers)
trace.note: Note: The report is in French; in V0 we keep section titles verbatim to preserve citation fidelity.
trace.no_citations: No citations available yet (V1). Add page + verbatim excerpts in traceability.json.
trace.footer: V0 shows sections; V1 shows citation-grade excerpts when available.
